sub_title: Managing Director and Board Member at IBM Client Innovation Center Netherlands
summary:
Leofwin has broad experience as business leader in an international environment. His passion is to build an organization with focus on improved business performance and creating a professional environment. He enjoys mentoring and coaching professionals preparing them for current and future career opportunities and challenges. Leofwin is able to balance a good working environment with meeting strict financial and operational objectives. His leadership style is straight forward with focus on building sustainable relationships and based on clear communication. He is a team player and enjoys and excels when managing change and transformation and is always looking for opportunities to improve. With his experience in sales and working with clients, he is able to translate their requirements to support and services provided by his business unit
Has broad experience in international business environment and as leader/manager of international teams. Enjoys building new organizations with continued focus on improved business performance and creating a professional environment. He is an Agile Champion, using Agile Leadership and Strategy in his daily operation.

Specialties: leading teams, building organizations, growing talent, Agile Champion, new ways of working, strategy formulation
